module.title: nouns
module.p: Nouns are words which typically refer to tangible material entities in the physical world – people, animals, objects, substances, places &c.
Nouns are classified into two distinct semantic-grammatical types, depending on the way they refer to things and the kinds of word they can appear alongside –

ul.li: Proper nouns are names of particular entities eg. Seumas James, Glaschu Glasgow, Laideann Latin.
Common nouns describe classes of entity eg. duine person, baile town, cànan language.
